attributes.action: NOT BAN SMOKING IN PRIVATE CARS and let common sense and personal judgement prevail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Your car – Your property - Your Choice
In effort to stop children being subjected to passive smoking; there are calls for the government to ban everyone from smoking in their cars, even if on your own.
There are some irresponsible people who would smoke in a car with children, but a ban that will effect millions to target the few is not the answer. 
Education, awareness campaigns and similar projects should be taken before stripping yet another of our rights. 
Your car – Your property - Your Choice 

Sign the petition to tell the government that we have common sense, that we want free choice, and that our cars are ours cars and not theirs!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
